extensionDescription.message: Grades and suggestions from Filmtipset everywhere on the web!

pageActionTitleUnknown.message: Filmtipset doesn't know whether you'll like this movie.

welcomeHtml.message:
Welcome!

To use this extension you have to create a personal user key on Filmtipset in order to get recommendations and grade movies. Then enter this user key below. The key should be created for pbolmsteds Chrome extension.
